meanings.definition: A small pit or depression in the retina of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The foveole in the retina helps with sharp vision.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the foveole in the patient's eye.
meanings.sent3: The foveole in the eye winked at the camera during the check-up.
meanings.sent4: Her focus was like a foveole, capturing every detail in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The foveole in the eye was like a tiny well of sight, drawing in all the light.

meanings.definition: A small fovea or pit in the skin.
meanings.sent1: She noticed a foveole on her arm after the fall.
meanings.sent2: The foveole on his palm was barely visible.
meanings.sent3: The foveole on the skin seemed to be a secret entrance to a hidden world.
meanings.sent4: The foveole on her cheek was like a dimple, but deeper.
meanings.sent5: The tiny foveole on his hand felt like a miniature valley on his skin.
